body_content.explanation: a traditional form of indoor roller hockey (= a type of hockey game played on roller skates) in which the players wear quad skates (= roller skates with four wheels on the bottom, two at the front, and two at the back):
examples: Rink hockey is a fast and exciting all-action sport that is easily learned and accessible to both boys and girls.
He took part in the Rink Hockey European Championship.
United Florida Hockey Club presents this year's Pan American Rink Hockey Championship.
